fields.headline: Overheard
fields.bodyText: Used as a verb, noun or adjective to describe someone who is inescapably everywhere at once. For example: "God, tonight I've got two book launches, three dinner parties and two cocktail parties. I am so going to have to Nigella it." Or: "This week, she's been spotted at four restaurant launches, two parties and three shop openings. She is such a Nigella."
